mapper.sql: u_id, p_id, province, school, department, stu_class, stu_no, stu_len, join_year, dis_num, dis_ranger
mapper.select: select * from stu_auth s join passenger p on s.p_id=p.p_id where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select * from stu_auth s join passenger p on s.p_id=p.p_id where s.p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select * from stu_auth s join passenger p on s.p_id=p.p_id where p.p_type='学生' and p.state = 0
select COUNT(*) from stu_auth s join passenger p on s.p_id=p.p_id where p.p_type='学生' and p.state = 0
select * from stu_auth s join passenger p on s.p_id=p.p_id where p.p_type='学生' and p.state = 0 limit #{start},#{limit}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into stu_auth (p_id, province, school, department, stu_class, stu_no, stu_len, join_year, dis_num, dis_ranger) values (#{passenger.pId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuLen,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{joinYear,jdbcType=DATE}, #{disNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disRanger,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

p_id,
province,

mapper.update:
update stu_auth
p_id = #{passenger.pId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stu_class = #{stuClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stu_no = #{stuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stu_len = #{stuLen,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
join_year = #{joinYear,jdbcType=DATE},
dis_num = #{disNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dis_ranger = #{disRanger,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update stu_auth set p_id = #{passenger.pId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_class = #{stuClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_no = #{stuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_len = #{stuLen,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, join_year = #{joinYear,jdbcType=DATE}, dis_num = #{disNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dis_ranger = #{disRanger,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
